item.itemvalue: Cucumber.Buying a high assurance ssl certificate
Cucumber.I want to be able to change when expiration reminders are sent
Cucumber.I want to be able to determine who receives ssl certs, receipts, reminders, and confirmations
Cucumber.Status messages need to reflect the stage the certificate order is in
RSpec.ApiCertificateCreate version 1.3 places a valid order: ssl_com_rails3
RSpec.OrdersController POST #create successful transaction shows the certificate reference number: ssl_com_rails3
RSpec.SignedCertificate as an ssl.com signed certificate: ssl_com_rails3

task.summary: EV, OV and DV defaults to DV on initial order placement
new certificate orders will automatically add up to 90 days to the duration if a valid certificate is already active for the domain name but will be expiring within 90 days
customer is notified of Courtesy Carryover Coverage upon csr submit
